item.description: Supervisor: Youcheng Sun Project: Verification and Testing of Linux/Android (Run-Time Verification) I have no idea. Yet. Will work on this over the summer.

item.title: Before The Coffee Gets Cold
item.description: Author: Toshikazu Kawaguchi & Geoffrey Trousselot This book was recommended, by a friend of a friend. He said he cried in an airplane reading this book.

item.title: Books
item.description: I love to read books, here’s my goodreads. My notion book reviews! Disclaimer! Okay, these are my personal book reviews,

item.title: Choosing modules
item.description: I might be considering an external module in 3rd year, given that I’ve chosen all the cs modules that I’m interested in.

item.title: COMP22712 Microcontrollers
item.description: Saturday, May 13th 2023 3:02 pm So I just finished submitting my last coursework submission for this module yesterday. This is a 100% coursework module, which involved 9 exercises, 4 of them are coursework submissions.

item.title: COMP23412 Software Enginnering II
item.description: exam was ok. team was good. My first time in uni, having an exam like this, usually it’s online(supervised). Was a nice experience, felt like A-levels all over again.

item.title: COMP25212 System Architecture
item.description: This module is very interesting. However, I think I messed up 2 of the 3 courseworks I had. Thursday, May 18th 2023

item.title: COMP26020 Programming Languages and Paradigms
item.description: A one year long module :weary:. Okay I just realised because Asma told me that this exam, is a 70% exam, of a 20 credit module.

item.title: COMP27112 Introduction to Visual Computing
item.description: So much content! We have essay type questions. And they haven’t released the answers for the esay type questions :’(

item.title: Consequences
item.description: [!QUOTE] Via Li in why you need to live for yourself and not for others | journal entry ep. 5

item.title: Crocs
item.description: Here’s a pic of my favourite pair of crocs. Just got the orange juice box charms when I went out with Asma K.

item.title: Disappointment
item.description: [!QUOTE] Via Li in why I’ve NEVER dated before… still SINGLE at 22 | journal entry ep. 2 The scary thing about going for the things that you want is that you get disappointed.

item.title: Dune
item.description: Author: Frank Herbert Dune, Dune #1 It took me 3 months to finish this book. It’s a REALLY GOOD BOOK, but I was just struggling out of my reading slump by then.

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: I have a lot of hobbies! I’ll try to share some here: [[notes/Hobbies/Music|Music]] Cooking Baking Reading, may I redirect you to my [[notes/Books|personal book reviews]] Drawing + Watecolour tbd: Roller Skating?

item.title: Honesty
item.description: [!QUOTE] The Bottom by Gracie Abrams Gonna regret being too honest

item.title: How To Make Friends With The Dark
item.description: Author: Kathleen Glasgow I think this book is a famous one. I was 30% in and then I stopped because it was getting a bit too much for me …

item.title: Life
Music
item.description: Wednesday, May 24th 2023 6:54 pm I play the ukulele! I used to play ‘gambang’(a wooden xylophone sort of, no it’s not a marimba, it’s gambang) in secondary school.

item.title: Pancakes
item.description: I LOVE this pancakes! I got this recipe from this youtube video! I found this recipe when I was little, and have been using it since!

item.title: Recipes
item.description: This section was recommended by Asma K! :XD: Some recipes I use: [[notes/Recipes/Pancakes|Pancakes]]

item.title: Scrap Book
item.description: I kinda want to share pictures, and document my life in a way. Idk yet how, but we’ll see. [[notes/Scrap Book/Crocs|Crocs]]

item.title: So I Deleted Social Media
item.description: Tuesday, May 23rd 2023 3:11 pm I deleted social media! (deactivated 2 instagram accounts, main and second account and 1 facebook account) I don’t really use facebook, but I link them with both my instagrams because elders in my family use facebook more, so just want to keep them up to date with me.

item.title: Something Dark and Holy
item.description: The books in this series are: Wicked Saints (Something Dark and Holy #1) Ruthless Gods (Something Dark and Holy #2) Blessed Monsters (Something Dark and Holy #3) Author: Emily A.

item.title: Study Less Study Smart
item.description: Marty Lobdell - Study Less Study Smart Personally, I can’t focus if I just don’t want to study. I prefer to go do just whatever I want first, until I exhaust it all, and reach a point where I just don’t want to do anything else, but study.

item.title: The Exhibitionist
item.description: This one … This one deserves ALL my time so I am NOT going to do it now because I have exams coming up.

item.title: The Prophet
item.description: Author: Kahlil Gibran I picked up this book because, I’ve been seeing this name ‘Kahlil Gibran’ everywhere on instagram. He has some really good quotes and I saved some of them.

item.title: The Scholomance
item.description: The books in this series are: A Deadly Education (The Scholomance #1) The Last Graduate (The Scholomance #2) The Golden Enclaves (The Scholomance #3) Author: Naomi Novik

item.title: Three Dark Crowns
University
item.description: Yes, I am a university student. I study MEng Computer Science in The University of Manchester. [[notes/University/2nd Year|2nd Year]] [[notes/University/3rd Year|3rd Year]]
